info.title: HTTP API for pdjr-skplugin-alarm-manager
info.description:
[pdjr-skplugin-alarm-manager](https://github.com/pdjr-signalk/pdjr-skplugin-alarm-manager)
is a plugin for the
[Signal K node server](https://github.com/SignalK/signalk-server).

A Signal K server hosting the plugin will present this API under
the root https://*server_ip*:*server_port*/plugins/alarm-manager.

get.description: Get a list of all active alarm notifications.

200.description:
Success.
The response body is an array of alarm notification objects.

500.description:
Error.
The server was unable to service the request.

get.description: Get a list of configured outputs which includes their current state.

200.description:
Success.
The response body is an array of current state objects.

500.description:
Error.
The server was unable to service the request.

get.description: Get the current state of the output specified by {name}.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Identifier of the output channel whose state is required.

200.description:
Success.
The response body contains the value 1 to indicate that
the output is ON, or 0 to indicate that the output is OFF.

404.description:
Error.
The request was invalid (bad or missing output {name}).

500.description:
Error.
The server was unable to service the request.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Identifier of the output channel which should be suppressed.

200.description:
Success.
Output channel {name} has been suppressed.

404.description:
Error.
The request was invalid (bad or missing output {name}).

500.description:
Error.
The server was unable to service the request.

output-name.description:
Name of an alarm output channel as defined in the alarm-manager
configuration.

output-state.description:
Integer representation of the state of an alarm output channel.
0 says OFF, 1 says ON.

output-list.description: Summary of the state of all alarm output channels.

notification-list.description: Array containing a sorted list of active Signal K alarm notifications.
